definition[0]: to put money which has been obtained illegally into legal businesses and bank accounts, so that you can hide it or use it
example[0]: He was jailed for laundering drug money.
definition[1]: to wash and iron clothes, sheets etc
definition[2]: to put money which has been obtained illegally into legal businesses and bank accounts in order to hide where it was obtained
example[1]: The bank had allegedly laundered money for drug dealers and other criminals.
